summary: Mowgli, missing the jungle and his old friends, runs away from the man village unaware of the danger he's in by going back to the wild.
cast: John Goodman|Haley Joel Osment|Mae Whitman|Connor Funk|Bob Joles|Tony Jay|John Rhys-Davies|Jim Cummings|Phil Collins|Jeff Bennett|Veena Bidasha|Brian Cummings|Baron Davis|Bobby Edner|Jess Harnell|Devika Parikh|Jimmy Bennett|J. Grant Albrecht
title: El libro de la selva 2
